data.eml:eml: A taxonomic review of Longchuanacris Zheng et Fu (Orthoptera: Acrididae: Catantopinae), with descriptions of two new species from Yunnan, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mao, Ben-Yong, Ren, Guo-Dong, Ou, Xiao-Hong (2007): A taxonomic review of Longchuanacris Zheng et Fu (Orthoptera: Acrididae: Catantopinae), with descriptions of two new species from Yunnan, China. Zootaxa 1467: 51-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176617
